Source.Name: samba
Source.Summary: Provides file and print services to SMB/CIFS clients and Windows networking to Linux clients
Source.Description:
Provides file and print services to SMB/CIFS clients and Windows networking to Linux clients
Includes a Solus-specific configuration that enables user shares by default (can be disabled).
